cardInfo.title: Creating and Editing Cards
cardInfo.description: Quick reference for choosing the right combination of commands to create new cards or update existing ones

attributes.instructions:
## üîß Card Tools: Create, Edit, Update

### Creating Cards
| Tool | Use When |
|------|----------|
| **write-text-file** | New card from scratch (provide full JSON structure) |
| **copy-card + patch-fields** | Clone existing card as template, then modify |
| **SEARCH/REPLACE** | New .gts definitions or JSON via code mode |

### Editing Cards
| Tool | Use When | Don't Use When |
|------|----------|----------------|
| **patch-fields_3e67** ‚≠ê | Field updates (nested paths, arrays, linksTo) ‚Äî **preferred** | Card doesn't exist yet |
| **patchCardInstance** | Full card replacement (use sparingly ‚Äî replaces entire card) | Surgical edits |
| **SEARCH/REPLACE** | Code (.gts), JSON structure, schema changes, new files | Small markdown edits in large docs |
| **ApplyMarkdownEdit** | Targeted edits in large markdown fields | Short fields, code files, non-markdown |

**Quick Decision:**
```
Card doesn't exist yet?
‚îú‚îÄ From scratch ‚Üí write-text-file
‚îú‚îÄ Clone + modify ‚Üí copy-card ‚Üí patch-fields
‚îî‚îÄ Code mode ‚Üí SEARCH/REPLACE

Card already exists?
‚îú‚îÄ Update fields ‚Üí patch-fields (preferred)
‚îú‚îÄ Full replacement ‚Üí patchCardInstance (sparingly)
‚îú‚îÄ Edit .gts or JSON structure ‚Üí SEARCH/REPLACE
‚îî‚îÄ Small change in big markdown ‚Üí ApplyMarkdownEdit
```

**File Naming:** Definitions: `kebab-case.gts` | Instances: `PascalCase/slug.json` | Links: `BlogPost/my-post` (no `.json`)

**Path Rules:** Use `./`, `../` relative paths for same-realm `adoptsFrom`. Use absolute URLs for cross-realm. After copy/move, verify linkage!
